title: Can we please make a section specifically for people ranting or venting
body: Please? I don't want to see posts like "I GOT A BAD TEAM IN SOLO QUE SO I'VE COME HERE TO VENT ABOUT IT" on the front page when i log in. There's a very fine line between a rant/vent vs an opinion thread. Thanks.

replies.body: Lol the Diablo 3 forums are the same, theres so much QQ there it's hilarious. There will always be people QQing because they can't handle 1 dam loss.
No because it's an opinion thread not a rant
They do say that it's healthier to give a way to release stress than to suppress it. Developing a proper outlet for anger management might make way for a content community.
